content.plain_text: By default, characters display the "neutral" emote.
content.verbatim: By default, characters display the "neutral" emote.

content.plain_text: Any number of lines of dialog can be given following the name of a character (the speaker).
content.verbatim: Any number of lines of dialog can be given following the name of a character (the speaker).

content.plain_text: The name of an emote can be specified alongside the name of the speaking character.
content.verbatim: The name of an emote can be specified alongside the name of the speaking character.

content.plain_text: You can?  I've always used a stage direction!
